SICK and MSRVID experiments.from sentence: For the SICK and MSRVID experiments , we used 300 - dimension Glo Ve word embeddings .

STS2014 , WikiQA , and TrecQA experiment.from sentence: For the STS2014 , WikiQA , and TrecQA experiments , we used 300 dimension PARAGRAM - SL999 embeddings from and the PARAGRAM - PHRASE embeddings from , trained on word pairs from the Paraphrase Database ( PPDB ) .

Our timing experiments.from sentence: Our timing experiments were conducted on an Intel Xeon E5 - 2680 CPU .

sentence length variations.from sentence: Due to sentence length variations , for the SICK and MSRVID data we padded the sentences to 32 words ; for the STS2014 , WikiQA , and TrecQA data , we padded the sentences to 48 words ..
